Title: Provides medical assistance coverage for the cost of donor breast milk which is medically necessary for certain infants
Summary: Provides medical assistance coverage for the cost of donor breast milk which is medically necessary for certain infants.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring medical assistance coverage for the cost of donor breast milk in certain circumstances
